QuestData.Title: WANTED: Summoner Marcelis
QuestData.Description:
Be advised:
Summoner Marcelis and his cohorts are dabbling in dangerous magics. They are calling forth ashen elementals to ravage these Light-scorched lands.
We cannot let such acts continue.
Any who can are urged to put an end to this madness.
- Dispatcher Raluca
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Summoning elementals somewhere within the shadows.
